Reviews.Title: Great all around phone if you don't want a smart phone
Reviews.Author: Dave Marshall
Reviews.Content: I've used this phone for almost 3 years and still don't have a strong desire to replace it.What I use it for:  I wanted a phone that was good at being a phone (novel, I know) and good for texting.  It's my primary alarm clock and the occasional calculator.Pros: The two way hinge works great and still feels the same after years of use.  I love the physical keyboard for texting.  You can bring up your call log (both incoming and outgoing) just by hitting the send button, something I use all the time.  At the rate I use it (about 200 minutes a month) the battery lasts almost a week before I have to charge it.  The clamshell design protects the main screen and prevents "butt dialing".Cons: My biggest complaint by far is that it only holds 50 texts in you inbox before you have to clear out your inbox.  This is ridiculous when it can hold plenty of pictures (not to mention that I have a 2 GB flash card in it).  This is more of an annoyance than a real problem.  The camera is... functional.  1.3 MP is good enough for a background on the phone, but it doesn't look good on a computer.It can hold and play mp3's if you want to but you're better off just using an iPod or similar.Overall it's a great phone if what you want is a phone.  If you want a media center/smartphone/game playing/social networking device, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: BAD SHAPE
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Girlfriend loves this type of phone, when hers broke down I was going to buy her a replacement from eBay.  Someone said I should check on amazon for the phone which I wound up doing. Phone was described as in great shape, when we received the phone one of the buttons was missing, the old owners music and messages full of profanity and some pictures were still on the phone. The seller I guess took offense to my rating and called my girlfriend up wanting to know why I rated the experience the way I did and she told him.  I don't want a new phone or anything like that just please as a seller double check the items you are shipping out to your customers and make sure they are what you say.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: isc11
Reviews.Content: ok this phone is one of the phones i had in the past that i loved and all that came to a end but when i was looking on amazon i found one and for a good price which was good but imma tell you the pros and conspros:just about everythingcons: the camera flash its pretty dimbut other than that pretty good deal ...... :]

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Great little phone with a keyboard. If you don't want to pay fees for a smart phone this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Samsung U740 Phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Coate
Reviews.Content: The phone was in very good condition, it rings, and it came pretty fast.  I am quite happy with my purchase, plus I got a great price on it!

Reviews.Title: Like the Phone
Reviews.Author: Enoch
Reviews.Content: This model phone has been used by a member of my family. When the original phone outlived its life, she wanted the same one as an interim phone while she was shopped for a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: figman824
Reviews.Content: My phone was 25$ refurb. off eBay, good deal.Pros:qwerty pad helps text fastsolidly builtcool lookinginexpensivecan get both flip and qwerty functionsno smartphone pricefun to useelegantCons:bad speakersno standard headphone cable inputcharger slot is tricky to enter, takes 5 seconds fiddling.QUICK battery life, ~2 days normal usage.connection is so-sobad cameratext inbox needs clearing now and thenregular number pad is tiny to fit a qwerty, dialing is tougher

Reviews.Title: Great phone for heavy texting
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This was my husbands first serious texting phone. He was so sorry to see it go when I upgraded him to a smartphone in 2011.  However, we bought another one for his Mom in Dec 2012 and she loves it too. She uses ut for heavy texting & likes the screen for seeing pics & videos of the kids.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The phone worked great and it arrived in a timely fashion I have nothing else to say life us like a box of chocolates

Reviews.Title: Old Model Phone
Reviews.Author: alanqning
Reviews.Content: It came out years ago and was the phone that I bought when it first came out.  My phone broke after 5 years of use and I needed a replacement, this phone was quite inexpensive on amazon so I tried this product.  My phone after 5 years had slight problems that made it difficult to use sometimes but when I first got this as a replacement phone it had no problems.  It did eventually have minor problems but nothing compared to my 5 year old phone.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: trisha
Reviews.Content: It took hours for me to program it . and days before I could use, I was without a phone for a day or two.I bought a different phone and gave this one to my son. His text messages are only going through half of the time

Reviews.Title: Nice replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Joann
Reviews.Content: Not a bad little phone! Takes nice pictures and love the flip/qwerty feature! Even had bonus ring tones! Works well.

Reviews.Title: Lost it already
Reviews.Author: ED
Reviews.Content: It was great for two days then he lost it again but was great while he had it. Thank you

Reviews.Title: a good phone for being used
Reviews.Author: Tom Peyton
Reviews.Content: I have had about 4 others of this same model, all used. This is by far the best one I have had with the exception that the battery does not last all day. I think it needs a new battery

Reviews.Title: GREAT QUALITY & NEAT TOO HAVE!!
Reviews.Author: kevin koutsky
Reviews.Content: WELL PRICED for the features you get if you do not mind having a SmallerPHONE BECAUSE THE FUNCTIONS FOR WHICH YOU USE FOR SELECTIONS ARE A BIT SMALL!!OVERALL A WELL MADE PHONE & A VARIETY OF FUNCTIONS!!

Reviews.Title: good replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Terresa Morales "Terresa Morales"
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my husband as a replacement phone and it works fine. Said it was used but it did not have a scratch on it.It came way before it said it would which was great and included the charger battery and back cover. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Tiny
Reviews.Author: Rusty
Reviews.Content: The QWERTY key pad and numbers are really tiny. Hard to push them without pushing two at the same time. Get the one that is larger and nicer. It is the U750.

Reviews.Title: samsung u740
Reviews.Author: M.L.
Reviews.Content: This phone was advertised as being new, I am having doubts about that due to the problems I am experiencing. The silver directional ring around the ok button is lifting off.  The external clock works on occasion.  When taking pictures there are vertical black lines showing.  I previously owned this same phone for 3 years and never experienced anything like this.  I may have to buy a replacement phone if the problem persists.

Reviews.Title: does not survive water
Reviews.Author: Taucia
Reviews.Content: the phone worked very well except for a little bit of service reception. But i dropped it in a toilet, we tried to dry it out with rice. but it was to late the fone is copuut

Reviews.Title: Love it but only a couple bad things
Reviews.Author: cowboy fan
Reviews.Content: I love this phone you dont have to have a data plan its easy to use and the buttons are only a problem if you have huge hands.  I have had the phone for about a month and the charger stopped working so i just went to walmart and bought a new one for $14.96.  But the only real problem so far is that it  will randomly turn itself off, and the battery life is not that long.

Reviews.Title: a good phone
Reviews.Author: adamcool98
Reviews.Content: this phone is a ok phone. i think that this phone is very helpful it has a small key board but i have small hands so that's ok it flips two wayswitch is cool........ect!!!!!

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: mony
Reviews.Content: cell phone did stay on it turn off also could text or do any thing with cell my bluetooth didnt pair with cell

Reviews.Title: Currently own!
Reviews.Author: lexi2
Reviews.Content: I currently have this phone i got it from verizon though. I want a touchscreen phone and I have been looking at the pantech crux! i reallly like it alot and just wanted to know if anyone has had that phone and in comparison to my current phone the alias! or if anyone knows about any other phones with touhscreen and are non smart phones!! that are cheap. thnx!
